resources.string: Check if your mask is marked with ALL the following elements:
Your mask is not a FFP2 type with high certainty.
Check if your mask or its case includes ANY of the following elements:
Your mask is a FFP2 type with high certainty.

Please observe your mask and its case. In the following screens you will be prompted to fill several checkboxes depending on what you see printed on your mask. Follow the steps to check that your mask is a valid FFP2 type.
but it may be another standard not approved by the EU. Let\'s check it.
The mask doesn\'t have any markings
Does the mask have any kind of markings on it or its case? (brand, CE logo, etc.)
Your mask is FALSE with a high certainty. Please discard it and reclaim a valid one.
